panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together

targets.expr: (sum by(node) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node="$node",job="$job", mode!="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(node) group_left sum by (node)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node="$node",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))) * 100

panels.title: CPU Busy

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (5 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (5m avg)

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (15 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (15m avg)

targets.expr: sum by(node) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node="$node",job="$job", mode="system"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(node) group_left sum by (node)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node="$node",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(node) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node="$node",job="$job", mode="user"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(node) group_left sum by (node)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node="$node",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(node) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node="$node",job="$job", mode="iowait"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(node) group_left sum by (node)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node="$node",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(node) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node="$node",job="$job", mode=~".*irq"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(node) group_left sum by (node)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node="$node",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(node) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node="$node",job="$job", mode!='idle',mode!='user',mode!='system',mode!='iowait',mode!='irq',mode!='softirq'}[$__rate_interval])) / on(node) group_left sum by (node)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node="$node",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(node) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node="$node",job="$job", mode="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(node) group_left sum by (node)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node="$node",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

panels.description: Disk space used of all filesystems mounted
panels.title: Disk Space Used Basic
